title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Complete problems on rocket propulsion fundamentals, including thrust calculations and specific impulse analysis.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze combustion efficiency and stability in rocket engines using provided experimental data and theoretical models.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design an optimized rocket nozzle for a specified mission profile, including performance calculations and design justification.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Short quiz covering fundamental aerodynamic concepts including Bernoulli's principle and airfoil theory.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Perform detailed analysis of subsonic and supersonic flow regimes over various geometries using computational tools.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Calculate aerodynamic heating loads during atmospheric re-entry and design appropriate thermal protection systems.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a spacecraft structural framework that meets load requirements while minimizing mass using appropriate materials.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Solve orbital mechanics problems including trajectory planning, orbital transfers, and delta-v calculations.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Comprehensive exam covering spacecraft systems integration, power systems, thermal control, and communication systems.

title: Functional Groups Problem Set
description: Identify and predict properties of various functional groups in organic compounds through structure analysis problems.

title: Synthesis Pathway Design
description: Design a multi-step organic synthesis pathway for a target molecule using retrosynthetic analysis.

title: Spectroscopy Analysis Lab Report
description: Analyze NMR, IR, and mass spectrometry data to determine the structure of unknown organic compounds and write a detailed lab report.

title: Coordination Compounds Quiz
description: Quiz on coordination compound nomenclature, structure, and bonding in transition metal complexes.

title: Crystal Field Theory Assignment
description: Apply crystal field theory to predict electronic configurations, magnetic properties, and colors of coordination complexes.

title: Catalysis Research Project
description: Research and present on a catalytic process, including mechanism, industrial applications, and environmental impact.

title: Thermodynamics Problem Set
description: Solve problems involving the laws of thermodynamics, Gibbs free energy, entropy, and chemical equilibrium.

title: Quantum Mechanics Exam
description: Comprehensive exam on quantum mechanical principles, wave functions, atomic structure, and molecular orbital theory.

title: Spectroscopy Data Analysis
description: Analyze experimental spectroscopy data, interpret spectra, and determine molecular properties using various spectroscopic techniques.

title: Elvish Translation Exercise
description: Translate provided texts between Sindarin/Quenya and English, demonstrating understanding of grammar and vocabulary.

title: Khuzdul Inscription Analysis
description: Decipher and analyze Dwarvish runes from historical inscriptions, providing translation and cultural context.

title: Comparative Linguistics Essay
description: Write an analytical essay comparing the linguistic structures and cultural influences of different Middle-earth languages.

title: Alliance Treaty Analysis
description: Analyze a historical alliance from Middle-earth, examining its formation, terms, and impact on inter-species relations.

title: Council of Elrond Case Study
description: Conduct a detailed case study of the Council of Elrond, analyzing diplomatic strategies and decision-making processes.

title: Diplomatic Strategy Presentation
description: Prepare and deliver a presentation on diplomatic strategies used during the War of the Ring, including crisis management and coalition building.
